EmailTemplate.name: 201904_Americas_Event_GoDirect_CustomerAdvisory_mih.201904_Americas_Email_GoDire
EmailTemplate.subject: RSVP Today for the Honeywell GoDirect Customer Advisory Board Meeting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>Honeywell GoDirect Customer Advisory Board Meeting in Washington D.C. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/safety-and-connectivity/jetwave-high-speed-satellite-communications-hardware]]> Hello GoDirect Customer Advisory Board Member,
It's hard to believe it's been a year since our last board meeting. Since last June, the Honeywell GoDirect team has been busy designing, developing and releasing software, applications and hardware based on your feedback. We are just getting started and have revised roadmaps and demonstrations to share with you as well as a large list of questions to get your valuable input. We will have a packed agenda again and hope you can make the meeting. Where: Honeywell Technology Experience Center 101 Constitution Ave NW, Suite 500 West Washington, DC 20001-2177
When: • Monday, June 10 – Welcome Cocktail Reception • Tuesday, June 11 – Meeting and Dinner • Wednesday, June 12 – Meeting
Please RSVP by Friday, May 10 so we can make appropriate hotel arrangements.
RSVP TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2019_GoDirect_CustomerAdvisory.html]]>
Best Regards,
John Peterson
